credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Leslie J. Schreyer
copyright: Wolfgang's Vault (they manage Bill Graham copyrights)
title: Howlin' Wolf
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description:
Poster for a 1967 concert in San Francisco, featuring Howlin' Wolf, Country Joe and the Fish, and Loading Zone. 

Predominently white background, purple female figure in mustard dress. Bottom of dress is made up of flowers and text:
Fillmore Aud. 
Fri Sat Apr 14-15 8pm-2am $3: Sun Apr 16 2pm to 7pm $2

Behind her, extremely stylized, attenuated pink text:
Howlin' Wolf

In mustard and white text on the right side:
Country Joe Loading Zone & The Fish
Visual simulation: Head Lights

Top border, in red outline all-caps san-serif, on mustard:
Presented in San Francisco by Bill Graham

Bottom border, ticket listings in white on purple.
restrictions:
Must contact Wolfgang's Vault for approval:
http://wolfgangsvault.com/licensing.aspx
name: Poster
